type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: Writing and defence of the Graduation Thesis.

objectives.en: A student has to demonstrate that he/she is able to complete and present a study of a practical or theoretical problem using the obtained knowledge during Bachelor studies.
objectives.et:
Anda üliõpilastele võimalus
- iseseisva teadusliku uurimistöö kaudu tõestada õppekava õpieesmärkide saavutatust,
- vastavasisulise uurimistöö läbiviimiseks, tulemuste vormistamiseks ja esitamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en:
Bachelor project shows that a student:
- knows how to use internet and literature on speciality,
- is able to apply the obtained knowledge for studing practical or theoretical problem,
- knows the requirements for presentation written text on speciality and follows these in his/her Bachelor paper.

description.et: Hinnatakse töö sisukust, vormistust ja kaitsmise edukust.

grade_evaluation.et: Komisjoni otsusel kaitsmise, kirjaliku töö ja retsensendi arvamuse põhjal.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
